rules_text.raw: [Hidden] (Hide now for Any Rune to react with later for [0].) Take control of an enemy unit at a battlefield. Ready it. (Start a combat if other enemies are there. Otherwise, conquer.) Lose control of that unit and recall it at end of turn. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

rules_text.raw: [Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.) Choose a friendly unit and a spell. Counter that spell and give that unit +Might equal to that spell's Energy cost this turn.

rules_text.raw: While you control this battlefield, friendly legends have Exhaust: Attach an Equipment you control to a unit you control.
Players can't score here until their third turn.
When you conquer here, you may pay 1 Energy to ready your legend.
While you control this battlefield, friendly [Repeat] costs cost 1 Energy less.
When you conquer here, put the top 2 cards of your Main Deck into your trash.
While you control this battlefield, the first friendly non-token gear played each turn costs 1 Energy less.
When you hold here, you may pay \Any Rune\Any Rune\Any Rune\Any Rune to score 1 point.
When you defend here, reveal the top card of your Main Deck. If it's a spell, put it in your hand. Otherwise, recycle it.
Units can't be played here.
When you conquer here, draw 1 for each other battlefield you or allies control.
When you conquer here with one or more [Mighty] units, you may pay 1 Energy to draw 1. (A unit is Mighty while it has 5+ Might.)
